name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CX - AI Led Customer Experience Evaluation Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower your UX with our AI-driven CX Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CX Chrome extension elevates customer experience evaluation to new heights. Powered by advanced AI algorithms, our tool not only provides in-depth insights into user interactions but also prioritizes accessibility, performance, journey analysis, design validations and SEO capabilities for comprehensive optimization.

Accessibility : CX goes beyond standard evaluation metrics by prioritizing accessibility. Our AI algorithms analyze website or application elements for compliance with WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines), ensuring inclusivity for all users, including those with disabilities. Identify and address accessibility barriers effortlessly, enhancing user experience for all.

Performance Optimization: Performance is paramount in delivering exceptional user experiences. CX offers comprehensive performance monitoring, analyzing loading times, page responsiveness, and resource utilization. With real-time performance insights, you can identify bottlenecks, optimize assets, and ensure smooth user experiences across devices and network conditions.

Customer Journey Analysis: Gain a holistic view of the customer journey with CX journey analysis capabilities. Track user interactions across touchpoints, identifying key entry and exit points, popular pathways, and conversion funnels. Understand user behavior at every stage of the journey, empowering you to optimize touchpoints and drive conversions effectively.

Design Validation: With CX, design validation is a breeze. Our AI algorithms analyze design elements such as layout, color contrast, typography, and visual hierarchy to ensure consistency and usability across all devices and screen sizes. Receive instant feedback on design elements that may impact user experience, allowing you to make informed decisions and create visually engaging interfaces.

Usability Testing: Usability is at the core of exceptional customer experiences. CX offers robust usability testing capabilities, allowing you to conduct A/B tests, heatmaps, and user surveys to gather qualitative feedback on design elements. Identify pain points, usability issues, and areas for improvement, ensuring that your design resonates with users and drives engagement.

SEO Optimization: In today's digital landscape, SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is critical for driving organic traffic and visibility. CX offers robust SEO capabilities, analyzing website or application elements for search engine friendliness. From metadata analysis to keyword optimization suggestions, our tool helps you improve search engine rankings and attract more qualified traffic.

CX is designed to empower businesses of all sizes to deliver exceptional digital experiences. Whether you're an e-commerce retailer, a SaaS provider, or a content publisher, our AI-led Chrome extension provides the insights and capabilities you need to thrive in the competitive digital landscape.

Unlock the full potential of your customer experience strategy with CX.
